entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023
